hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT pdependency FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.dependency.model.impl.SPlatformDependencyImpl AS pdependency WHERE pdependency.name = :name
SELECT pdependency FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.dependency.model.impl.SPlatformDependencyImpl AS pdependency WHERE pdependency.id IN (:ids)

SELECT pdependencymapping FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.dependency.model.impl.SPlatformDependencyMappingImpl AS pdependencymapping WHERE pdependencymapping.artifactId = :artifactId AND pdependencymapping.artifactType = :artifactType
SELECT pdependencymapping FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.dependency.model.impl.SPlatformDependencyMappingImpl AS pdependencymapping WHERE pdependencymapping.dependencyId = :dependencyId

SELECT pdependencymapping.dependencyId FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.dependency.model.impl.SPlatformDependencyMappingImpl AS pdependencymapping WHERE pdependencymapping.artifactId = :artifactId AND pdependencymapping.artifactType = :artifactType ORDER BY pdependencymapping.id ASC
